title: Marantz logo
content:
probably custom, but has anyone got a recommendation of an approximation?

[here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013110409/http:/www.stegen.com/images/marantz_logo.jpg)
author: popluhv

comments.content: Save for the serif on a and t, that's pretty darn close! Thanks

Someone made a font inspired by it:  
 [http://www.studiodilena.it/fonts/marantz.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013110409/http:/www.studiodilena.it/fonts/marantz.php "http://www.studiodilena.it/fonts/marantz.php")
